entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：可拓展性
entry.content:
大家好，我们即将迎来 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 大版本的更新。在本篇博客中，我将会重点展示在 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 当中可拓展性部分的亮点更新内容。本次更新主要包含可拓展性对象、ABAP 开发工具、可拓展性助手的相关更新。

可拓展性对象变更概览

在本次的更新中，我们进一步丰富了支持的 CDS View , BAdI 以及 API 的种类，扩充了支持的字段，以进一步满足公有云客户的客制化需求。例如新增了两个 BAdIs ，BADI_CTE_CB_COST_OBJECT 和 BADI_CTE_FP_CB_AD_DETM_DOC_KEY 。前者可以用于修改更改成本对象数据，后者可以用于确定现金预付款的 Concur 参考文档密钥。在贷项凭证的 API - Credit Memo Request (A2X, OData V2) 里， A_CreditMemoRequestItem 实体下新增以下字段的支持： PurchaseOrderByShipToParty, CorrespncExternalReference, CorrespncExtRefByShipToParty, Batch, ProductGroup, BillingDocumentDate 。

同时值得注意的一点是，Purchase Requisition 的 OData V2 API - API_PURCHASEREQ_PROCESS_SRV 已经过时，请大家尽快切换到后继的 OData V4 API - API_PURCHASEREQUISITION_2 ，以免影响业务。

您可以通过以下链接进一步了解本次所有更新的可拓展性对象： Overview of Changes in Extensibility Objects | SAP Help Portal

 

ABAP 开发工具更新

本次版本更新中， ADT（ABAP Development Tool）同样迎来了很多更新，例如 ABAP SQL 消费模型、创建 CDS 表实体的行为定义、增强元素信息弹窗、改进 ABAP 覆盖率视图等等。这些功能都可以有效增强开发者可拓展性的范围和使用体验。

您可以访问以下链接了解 ADT 的详细更新：What's New Viewer - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition | SAP Help Portal

 

可拓展性助手

以下功能需要有额外的 Licence ，可以参考链接了解更详细的内容：GenAI-Driven Extensibility Assistant | SAP Help Portal

可扩展性助手是一个由生成式人工智能驱动的助手。在自定义字段这个应用程序中，它可以帮助您完成与字段可扩展性相关的各种任务，如创建自定义字段、查找业务上下文、查找用量、查找价值帮助视图和启用业务场景。在自定义逻辑这个应用程序中，可扩展性助手可以基于您的业务需求输入，找到合适的 BAdIs ，即业务增强点。

目前在自定义字段这个应用里，支持以下方式调用可拓展性助手：

在开始屏幕中调用扩展性助手：在自定义字段列表右上角的按钮栏上，您会发现一个菱形按钮。单击它将打开扩展性助手，您可以在其中在标记为 Your Question 的文本框中输入您的问题或请求。然后将指导您完成后续步骤。您可以随时在文本框中输入其他问题。若要结束对话并确保不考虑以前的讨论，请单击扩展性助手窗口右下角的重置 。

在详细信息屏幕中调用扩展性助手：在屏幕底部的按钮栏上，您将找到菱形按钮。单击它将打开扩展性助手，您可以在标记为 Your Question 的文本框中键入您的问题或请求。例如，如果您想询问有关详细信息屏幕上显示的自定义字段，则可以使用 “this field” 之类的表达式来引用它。一个常见的用例是通过 OData 服务、UI、CDS 视图或 SOAP API 寻求帮助以发布字段。

当前，可拓展性助手只支持英语的输入和输出。

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：分析报表
entry.content:
最新的SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508版本为分析带来了强大的功能增强，突显了SAP致力于提供优质数据分析工具的承诺。此次更新不仅提升了效率，还增强了嵌入式分析的可用性和功能。下面我们将深入探讨这个版本的重要功能。

  • 视图浏览器增强
  • 多维分析：图表功能升级
  • 审核手册：页面评论功能
  • 审核手册APP中的“重置”功能
  • 升级审核手册报表
  • 【重要】弃用的分析业务目录
  • 【重要】CE2508 弃用的CDS 视图

视图浏览器增强

此次发布的一大亮点是视图浏览器应用的增强。现在，视图浏览器应用使用多维分析来显示发布的分析查询，而不是传统的Web Dynpro Grid。这种变化为用户提供了更灵活和直观的数据分析界面，使复杂数据集的可视化和解释更加有效。

 

 

此外，用户可以方便地访问有关已弃用的CDS视图的详细信息，包括其弃用日期和替代者细节。这通过一个简单的链接或直接导航到相应的CDS视图来实现。此功能确保客户能够清晰快速了解到目前自开发项目的状态，从而有效地规划和管理。

 

多维分析：图表功能升级

CE2508在多维分析功能中进行了显著增强，特别是在图表功能区域。新增的系列轴功能，大大提升了数据可视化。该功能允许用户在图例或系列轴上添加维度，从而提供更大的数据呈现的灵活性。

目前，系列轴功能支持众多图表类型，包括柱状图、条形图、折线图、组合柱线图、热图、堆积条形图、堆积柱形图、百分比堆积条形图和百分比堆积柱形图。这种广泛支持确保客户能够选择最适用的图表类型，以准确地表达其数据情境。

 

审核手册：页面评论功能

在本次更新中，最引人注目的新功能之一是页面评论功能。该功能允许用户将评论附加到特定报告页面，并将其与相关筛选条件、维度和度量联系起来。这不仅促进了实时协作和反馈跟踪，还确保即使视图发生变化，每个人都在相同的数据背景下工作。这一改进显著提升了数据分析的无缝协作能力。

 

页面评论功能涵盖了几个直观的操作：

  • 添加评论： 用户可以轻松为当前视图添加评论，并自动保存相关变量、筛选条件、维度、结构和度量。
  • 管理讨论： 支持通过回复进行线程讨论或为不同话题发起新的讨论线程。
  • 显示评论： 评论默认与当前视图链接，用户可以通过关键词、分类、标签和状态进行快速搜索。
  • 编辑与协作： 用户可以编辑评论属性并使用标签通知团队成员，促进针对特定分析需求的协作数据讨论。

这项功能的推出，为团队成员之间的信息分享和合作提供了强大的支持，有助于更精准地满足数据分析的需求。

 

审核手册： “重置”功能

为了进一步简化分析流程，审查册中引入了“重置”按钮。在分析数据时,应用各种过滤器和进行详细的深入分析是常见步骤，然而，要回到默认设置重新开始分析常常需要繁琐的手动调整。有了“重置”按钮，用户现在只需点击一下即可轻松恢复默认布局，即标准视图。这项功能通过简化重置分析参数的步骤，提高了用户的工作效率。

 

升级审核手册报表

在系统升级之后，审核手册可能不是最新的，需要更新以提供最新的配置和功能。

当用户打开审核手册的配置时，需要升级的审核手册会提示用户改审核手册需要升级。升级确保所有审核手册保持高度的更新性和功能性，从而为用户提供有效的分析能力。

entry.title: SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻: 财务
entry.content:
【计划安排】
三系统升级及维护计划 
两系统升级及维护计划

【新功能】
1. “过账资产购置-和数量调整”应用支持总购置价
要通过采购过账资产购置，而无需参考采购订单以及与应付账款会计集成，而是针对清算科目过账，请使用过账资产购置 - 和数量调整应用 (F6488)。
之前，只能使用此应用过账净购置, 购置（净额）：这是标准选项。使用此选项，您可以指定（净）购置成本。
但是，现在，如果要过账除购置和生产成本 (APC) 外具有值调整的资产的资产购置，则可以进行总值过账。为此，使用新业务交易类型购置（总额）。然后，您可以输入 APC 和相关价值调整，例如普通或计划外折旧。使用此选项，您可以指定使用年限开始时的原始购置和生产成本，以及在采购前产生的资产折旧。

2. 资产过账到特殊期间(调整期间)
对于资产会计，以下内容适用：之前，在用于资产过账的 SAP Fiori 应用中，无法在特殊期间过账。现在，可以执行此操作。财务会计的标准逻辑现在适用。这意味着，如果会计年度针对正常期间关闭并且您想要过账到特殊期间，则在会计年度的最后一个期间中输入日期作为应用中的过账日期。
示例
使用 K4 作为会计年度变式，即会计年度与日历年相对应，并且您有四个特殊期间。
会计年度 YYYY 中的正常期间（1月到12月）已关闭。但是，您想要使用过账资产重估应用 (F7775) 在此会计年度中进行重估过账。
然后，指定会计年度 YYYY 的 12 月作为过账日期。然后，日记账分录将过账到此过账日期的第一个打开的未清特殊期间。
对于合同和租赁管理，这同样适用于可用于过账到资产或冲销资产过账的应用。

3. 基于事件的结算投资项目和在建工程
之前，只有一个选项可用于通过在建资产 (AuC) 将投资项目结算到已完成资产。先前的选项包括从投资项目到在建工程的定期结算；这些定期结算以汇总形式进行。
现在还有另一个选项：基于事件的结算。对于基于事件的结算，不会定期结算到在建资产；相反，投资项目的所有过账都会直接完全过账到在建资产。由于基于事件的结算将每个行项目的行项目结算到在建工程，因此稍后详细过账仍显示在在建资产中。基于事件的结算适用于发票往往很少的简单投资项目.

详细内容请参见SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻 - 基于事件结算的投资项目和在建工程

4. App资产业务的视图‘结算的日记账分录跟踪’支持基于作业的结算
在资产交易应用 (F1614) 中，您可以使用视图‘结算的日记账分录跟踪’。该视图可用于跟踪日记账分录链，该链从投资项目结算开始，到已完成资产的过账结束。
该视图现在还提供来自基于事件的结算的信息，即有关涉及的组织单位和日记账分录链的信息：对于特定资产，结算交易与合作伙伴资产（即在建资产 (AuC)）和投资项目（WBS 要素）一起列出。提供结算日记账分录和先前日记账分录的链接，其中包含到 WBS 要素的成本过账和从 WBS 要素到 AuC 的结算过账。

用户界面示例

5. CDS 视图I_FixedAssetCountryData的限制类型
CDS 视图 I_FixedAssetCountryData 提供对固定资产的国家/地区特定主数据的访问。之前，想要使用此视图的用户必须具有限制类型为 BURKS（公司代码）的业务角色。从 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2602 开始，计划添加以下限制类型：
A_S_MD（新资产主数据维护）：限制对新资产主数据的访问，例如，用于主数据维护。
BURKS_KOSTL（公司代码/成本中心）：限制对公司代码和成本中心的访问。
BUKRS_WERKS（公司代码/工厂）：限制对公司代码和工厂的访问。

b. 在参数部分，输入以下字段：
 科目表：根据需要输入值
 科目类型：K（供应商）
 特别总账：1（已收担保）
c. 在科目分配部分，维护对账科目和特殊总账科目。
2. 在此活动中，按照以下步骤维护每个科目表的清算科目：
a. 返回到区域部分，输入以下字段：
 范围：财务会计
 子范围：应收账款和应付账款
 流程：为自动抵销分录定义会计科目
b. 在参数部分，输入科目表。
c. 在科目分配部分，维护用于过账抵销分录的清算总账科目。可按借方和贷方过账区分科目。

24. 公司间成本分配对账审核手册

使用此应用显示公司间成本分配开票的端到端凭证流。它通过对账管理会计过账到开票凭证和应收账款凭证，提供凭证流的透明度。此可追溯性允许您：
• 在关账过程中确保数据的完整性。您可以识别与公司间开票相关且已开票、已部分开票或尚未开票的服务和费用。
• 提供有关已计费公司间服务的审计相关信息。
此功能不会自动在系统中可用，而是需要在配置活动激活功能中激活公司间成本分配对账 (CO_ICO_DOCFLOW) 功能。
备注
这是此创新功能的初始版本，并且存在一些功能限制。在未来版本中可能会发生更改。这些更改可能导致：
• 应用的缺省行为差异。
• 用户界面内容和布局之间的差异。
• 应用内存在一些数据丢失。例如，您在 我的视图 中配置的任何视图都可能会丢失。
此初始版本在管理 KPI 和报表应用中不可用。
此功能依赖于新公司间开票解决方案生成的数据，因此您必须已执行新资源相关公司间开票的配置。有关详细信息，请参阅生成公司间开票请求（新解决方案）。

25. ETO 场景的预算可用性控制：项目库存采购
通过此增强，您现在可以将预算可用性控制用于资产负债表科目。
为此，您必须使用带有可选调整的 SAP 预交付项目预算参数文件 PSQ01 (Projct Bdgt Avail Prfl Q Std)。或者，您必须为以全球货币作为预算货币类型的项目创建新的预算可用性控制参数文件，并将语义标记 PSQBUDGET 添加到此参数文件。
授权
创建、编辑和查看项目及其预算需要 SAP_BR_PROJ_FIN_CONTROLLER 角色。
配置
您需要在维护项目的预算可用性控制参数文件配置活动中维护设置。
缺省情况下，语义标记 PSQBUDGET 从配置为父标记的语义标记 ACT_COST 和 PRSLS_STCK 继承科目。因此，如果使用新的语义标记 PSQBUDGET，则语义标记和科目之间不需要分配。但是，SAP 预提供的预算参数文件 PSQ01 或新创建的预算可用性控制参数文件必须分配到将在 ETO 场景中使用的项目。
项目预算报表应用（标识：F3377）不显示与语义标记 PSQBUDGET 相关的数据。
要显示与 PSQBUDGET 相关的数据，请使用项目财务手册企业应用（标识：F8698），该应用正确显示以全球货币计的预算、项目库存、实际成本、承诺、已分配值和可用预算。

26. 应收账款项目的争议解决

使用债务回收管理中新的争议解决流程高效处理财务争议，并最大限度地降低其对运营和获利能力的影响。
新应用：
以下新应用可用于应收账款会计：
• 管理争议：在债务回收管理中查看和管理争议解决流程中的所有争议。在清单报表中，您可以获取所有争议及其处理步骤的概览：
• 管理应收账款项目：查看和管理应收账款项目以及与争议解决流程相关的信息：
• 维护规则和主数据：
在债务回收管理中计划争议解决作业
管理争议解决规则
业务流程配置专家可以使用以下应用维护当前设置：
• 计划债务回收管理的集成作业
• 激活债务回收管理
• 映射债务回收管理的公司代码
• 定义债务回收管理的过账分类
• 定义债务回收管理的过账子分类
• 定义债务回收管理的付款差异原因
• 定义债务回收管理的 FI 公司代码
这里需要激活新的7MA（争议解决）
与其他组件集成
激活债务回收管理时与其他组件的相关性。
范围项目 7MA 和 BFC 之间的相关性
债务回收管理的争议解决流程是范围项目争议解决 (7MA) 的一部分。此功能不能与 SAP Dispute Management 中的争议解决流程同时激活，SAP Dispute Management 是范围项目托收和争议管理 (BFC) 的一部分。
为第一个公司代码激活新的争议解决流程时，SAP Dispute Management 的历史争议解决流程将在所有应用中禁用。在以下当前设置应用中执行此激活：激活债务回收管理
注意
无法在激活债务回收管理应用中恢复新争议解决流程 (7MA) 的激活。
激活债务回收管理 (7MA) 中的争议解决流程也会影响其他组件的争议解决功能：

技术组件相关性
SAP Dispute Management (FIN-FSCM-DM)您不能将 SAP Dispute Management 与债务回收管理的争议解决流程同时使用。
SAP Collections Management (FIN-FSCM-COL)您可以将 SAP Collections Management 与债务回收管理的争议解决流程同时使用。但是，没有集成。
更多信息：与 SAP Collections Management 集成
应收账款会计 (FI-AR)您可以将应收账款会计与债务回收管理的争议解决流程同时使用。但是，与争议相关的功能没有集成。详细信息：与应收账款会计集成
应付账款会计 (FI-AP) 您可以将应付账款会计与债务回收管理的争议解决流程同时使用。但是，与争议相关的功能没有集成。
详细信息：与应付账款会计集成

27. 实际成本费率计算支持成本中心独立的货币迭代

• 在成本中心会计中，实际成本率计算是常见且关键的环节。企业通常要求在不同货币层面上（如全球货币、公司代码货币、自由定义货币等）精确核算、分摊及结算成本，确保报表的准确性和合规性。
• 在CE2508版本前，实际成本率计算 - 成本中心(KSII)仅支持以全球货币进行实际成本率计算，公司代码货币及自由定义货币下的实际成本率从全球货币根据汇率换算而来，导致部分金额无法被完全贷记，残留成本滞留在成本中心，会影响后续成本分摊及账面精度，增加对账难度。

详细情况，参见SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻- 实际成本率计算 - 成本中心支持独立的货币迭代以消除成本中心差异

28. 公司获利能力审核手册（模板）
作为销售会计，您可以使用此审核手册分析公司代码的获利能力。
通过此应用，您可以使用以下边际收益级别构建不同级别和不同时间维度的收入和成本：
• 边际收益 I：显示产品级别的可变销货成本。
• 边际收益 II：产品组级别的固定销货成本因子。
• 边际收益 III：考虑公司代码级别的固定成本。

还提供多个选项显示，

比如，选择已售产品组，

29. 货物制造成本 - 审核手册
通过此应用，您可以根据基于事件的制造订单（订单类别 10 和 40）显示、分析和验证货物制造成本 (COGM)。该应用显示有关实际货物制造成本的信息，并使用年初至今和期间比较对预定义报表进行分组。该应用使用成本构成细分功能，并使您能够使用两种构成细分方法显示成本：生产成本细分和来源成本细分。

30. 产品获利能力审核手册
作为销售会计，您可以使用此应用分析已售产品的获利能力。产品利润率视图为按不同维度销售的产品提供多级边际收益。COGS 细分视图提供过账到发货的 COGS 变量和固定 COGS 的细分。过账基于通用构成细分方法：生产构成细分和来源成本构成细分。

31. 项目财务手册 - 企业项目
作为销售会计，此应用可帮助您分析企业项目的项目利润率和其他关键财务指标。
通过此应用，您可以通过分析利润率来深入了解项目获利能力，从而帮助您做出明智的财务决策。
此应用具有以下页面：
• 有收入项目
此页面提供对基于项目的销售和按订单设计场景中的项目利润和重要项目（含收入）财务关键指标的洞察。
有收入的项目具有以下视图：
o 项目利润率概览
o 项目开票要素视图
o 项目预算 AVC

32. 和Concur集成：扩展点（业务加载项）：更改成本对象数据
新的扩展点 (BAdI) 更改成本对象数据使您能够进一步增强到 Concur 系统的成本对象导出。
您可以：
• 在 Concur 清单中更改成本对象的名称。
• 从导出中排除成本对象，因此不再予以考虑。
• 删除之前已导出到 Concur 系统的成本对象。
涉及到范围项目 1M1

33. 和Concur集成：显示 Concur 应用程序日志
使用显示 Concur 应用程序日志应用 (F8636)，您可以显示作为 Concur 集成的一部分创建的应用程序日志。
当您想要分析运行时性能、查看成功或取消的处理或分类问题（例如凭证过账失败）时，应用日志和相关消息非常有用。
实施详细信息
用户需要以下业务角色之一才能访问应用：
• SAP_BCR_CON_CTE_POST_MONI_PC
• SAP_BCR_CON_CTE_SETUP_PC
• SAP_BCR_CON_CTE_SETUP_DISP_PC
涉及到范围项目 1M1

34. 和Concur集成：Concur 过账凭证监控器
在 2508 版本中，我们引入了 SAP Fiori 版本的 Concur 过账凭证监控器应用 (F8690)。
新版本提供：
• 文档详细信息的集中视图
• 实时更新凭证更改
• 简化导航
• 使用过滤器提高灵活性
• 自定义视图配置
授权
要访问该应用，用户需要业务目录 SAP_CON_BC_CTE_POST_MONI_PC。
对现有数据的影响
现有文档数据和附件仍然可用，并且可以在新应用版本或旧应用版本中查看。
涉及到范围项目 1M1

【必须知晓】
所有的弃用信息请参照链接
我们识别应用生命周期中的不同状态：
• 激活
专为生产用途设计的应用版本。
• 已弃用
此应用专为生产用途而设计，但已过时，SAP 计划最终将其移除。其功能通常由后继应用涵盖。SAP 不再建议使用已弃用的应用，并在可用时建议使用该后继应用。
• 已删除
SAP 不再支持该应用，并且已从 SAP Fiori 快速启动板中将其删除。
应用弃用的初始公告与删除应用之间的期间至少为 6 个月。缺省情况下，弃用的应用在 SAP 提供的页面模板中可能不再可用。在这种情况下，您可以在应用查找器中找到该应用，直到将其删除为止。
弃用应用可能需要管理员审核分配到业务角色的业务目录。例如，确保将后继应用分配给相应的业务角色。有关详细信息，请参阅 SAP 注释 2975653 以访问包含版本特定 IAM 更改信息的所有 SAP 注释。

以下介绍比较重要的部分
35. 将成本中心组迁移到全局层次结构
使用将基于集合的组迁移到全局层次结构应用，您可以迁移管理成本中心组应用中定义的组。迁移后，这些组将成为管理全局层次结构应用中的层次结构，并且只能进行编辑。迁移还会更新将这些组用于新层次结构的应用程序。
要访问此应用，必须具有包含迁移到全局层次结构 - 当前设置 (SAP_CA_BC_HIEMIG_CURR_SET_PC) 业务目录的业务角色。SAP 提供配置专家 - 业务流程配置 (SAP_BR_BPC_EXPERT) 业务角色模板供您参考。

36. 成本中心 - 实际和成本中心 - 计划/实际的后继应用
Successor for Cost Centers - Actuals and Cost Centers - Plan/Actuals
通过成本中心 - 实际 (F0963) 和成本中心 - 计划/实际应用，您可以报告成本中心的实际数据或计划数据。这些应用的后继版本可用于成本中心审核手册 (F7763) 应用。此新应用版本未来将替换旧的成本中心 - 实际和成本中心 - 计划/实际应用。我们建议您尽快切换到后继应用成本中心审核手册。
新应用提供以下附加功能：
  所有相关的比较和 KPI 在一个应用中一目了然
  随时可用的报表比较、预定义度量、附加维度和过滤器选项
   一个屏幕上的所有报告选项

37. 管理成本中心组的后继应用
通过管理成本中心组 (F1024) 应用，您可以创建和编辑成本中心组。您还可以编辑成本中心标准层次结构。此应用的后继版本在管理全局层次结构 (F2918) 应用中提供。此新应用版本将来将替换旧的管理成本中心组应用。我们建议您尽快切换到后继应用管理全局层次结构。
新应用提供以下附加功能：
• 有效期、状态处理以及对未分配对象的分析
• 电子表格上载
• 一个屏幕上的所有层次结构维护选项
在两个涉及的应用中，都会启用新体验切换行为。如果业务最终用户同时具有旧应用和新应用的权限，则可以在两个应用版本之间切换。有关详细信息，请参阅切换到新应用版本。
在使用新应用之前，需要由管理员迁移现有成本中心组。这是一次性工作。迁移后，您可以继续在新应用中使用现有层次结构。
有关迁移流程的详细信息，请参阅如何将成本中心组迁移到全局层次结构。

38. 迁移分配周期到统一分配
这些功能使您能够将分配周期从前趋应用迁移到统一分配，执行验证运行以检查周期，在使用可变部分接收方规则时查看运行结果中的跟踪因素，比较周期的两个不同版本，并在管理分配中将附件添加到周期。
此功能由新应用监控周期迁移（应用标识：F8715）和计划间接费用会计核算作业（应用标识：F3767）的新的将周期迁移到统一分配 (SAP_FCOUA_MIGRATION) 作业计划模板组成。此功能允许您将源自前趋应用的分配周期迁移到统一分配。您可以从以下应用迁移周期：
应用标识     应用名称
KSU              间接费用分配周期 - 成本中心 - 实际

使用作业计划模板启动周期迁移，然后使用监控周期迁移应用监控迁移进度。消息日志会让您了解迁移期间出现的任何问题。成功迁移后，您可以直接从迁移结果中打开通用分配应用中的周期。

39. 弃用显示利润中心
自此版本起，显示利润中心 (KE53) 应用已弃用，将在即将发布的版本中移除。有关应用弃用的详细信息，请参阅应用的弃用流程。我们强烈建议您尽快切换到后继应用管理利润中心 (F3516)。

40. 弃用利润中心：实际行项目
自此版本起，利润中心：实际行项目 (KE5Z) 应用已弃用，将在未来发布的版本中移除。

41. 多个资产会计的app在2508版本被移除
在版本升级到 SAP S/4HANA 2508 期间，某些应用将从其 BC 中移除。其后继应用（创建供应商发票应用 (F0859)）现在可用于不同业务目录。

已移除应用业务目录/ 已移除应用后继应用业务目录/后继应用明细
创建供应商发票 - 高级 (MIRO)
创建供应商发票 (F0859)
显示供应商发票 (F7900)
显示供应商发票 - 高级 (MIR4)
供应商发票清单 (F1060A)		资产会计 - 运营处理 (SAP_FIN_BC_AA_DOC_PROC_PC)创建供应商发票 (F0859)资产会计 - 普通过账 (SAP_FIN_BC_AA_POST_REG_PC)

后继应用 (F0859) 已在先前版本中提供。

先前版本中已宣布替换。

有关后续应用的详细信息，请参阅使用“管理供应商发票”应用 (F0859) 过账集成的购置。

42. 弃用现金流量表（IDCNCASH）
自 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2202 起，现金流报表 - 中国 (IDCNCASH) 应用的旧应用版本有一个后继应用：中国凭证和报表合规性中的现金流量表报表。

自 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 起，旧应用版本现金流量表 - 中国 (IDCNCASH) 应用已弃用，将在即将发布的版本中移除。
我们强烈建议您尽快切换到凭证和报表合规性中的后继应用 现金流量表 报表。
新应用使您能够以表视图格式生成直接或间接现金流量表，并根据您的业务需求按月份/季度/年度提交给中国税务部门。

43. 管理直接活动分配启用新上传模板
标签 获利能力在用户界面和用于下载和上载分配项目的模板中，段编号 已更改为获利能力段。此更改会将模板的先前版本作废。
如果尝试上载旧版本的模板，将收到错误。通过下载新版本更新模板。

44. SAP 现金应用集成通信场景
SAP_COM_1018 通信场景（SAP Cash Application 集成）已弃用，将在即将发布的版本中删除。
SAP_COM_1018 通信场景（SAP Cash Application 集成）自 SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2502 起已弃用，将在即将发布的版本中删除。SAP_COM_0650 通信场景（具有相同名称 SAP Cash Application 集成）是 SAP_COM_1018 通信场景的后继。我们建议您尽快切换到后继通信场景 (SAP_COM_0650)。

entry.title: SAP ERP公有云 [SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition] 2508 亮点前瞻
entry.content:
在企业资源规划系统快速发展的背景下，推动数字化转型成为企业的核心需求。在这一转变的前沿，SAP凭借其帮助企业应对复杂且不断变化的业务需求的承诺，推出了崭新的SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508，这一版本旨在将企业运营提升到前所未有的高度。本博客旨在从大中华区客户的视角，挑选部分相关性高的应用更新予以介绍。您也可以移步Cloud ERP PSCC的负责人Bert Schulze的英文博客 ，进一步了解SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508的具体内容。 关于2508中国本地化的亮点功能，您可以移步 @Yu_Ada  的中文博客。

在这个不断演变的科技时代，企业在寻求解决方案时，不仅希望与战略目标保持一致，还期待能够提升运营效率。那么，作为一名企业领导者，为什么应该考虑采用SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508来推动您的运营迈向未来呢？以下是我们 SAP Cloud ERP PSCC 团队为您解读的是该版本的一些亮点：  

运用AI优化业务流程 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：人工智能  

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 新增了多项AI功能，这些更新重点聚焦在提升用户体验、获取深度业务洞察，以及优化现有功能上。旨在提高工作效率和准确性。 

 用户体验中的AI 创新：AI辅助企业搜索 (AI-Assisted Enterprise Search)  

用户现在可以直接在SAP Fiori Launchpad搜索栏中使用自然语言搜索业务对象,使业务数据查找过程更直观高效。 

 同时，近期推出的三项AI辅助用户体验创新功能—企业搜索(enterprise search) 、 轻松过滤器(easy filter) 和 智能总结(smart summarization) —现已在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition中免费使用。您只需接受 SAP AI使用条款 ，SAP将会为您的租户启用这些功能，即刻体验更直观的交互操作、更快的洞察速度及更高的生产效率。 

注： 本文介绍的AI功能尚未在中国大陆地区上线，建议您咨询您的SAP客户经理以获取最新的信息。 

Joule for Business：   

2025年Joule在S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition中带来了众多新功能，您可以通过自然语言指令在Joule中直接查询覆盖采购、销售、生产等核心模块的34类业务对象，消除应用切换需求。 

集团财务报表审阅手册 (Group Financial Statements Review Booklet) 

您可以在集团财务报表审阅手册中预定义的AI辅助业务洞察功能—即快捷操作（Quick Action）—中快速生成数据分析和摘要。 

 AI辅助解释固定资产关键指标 (AI-assisted explanation of fixed asset key figures) 

本功能深度解析固定资产关键指标的计算逻辑，通过自然语言以通俗易懂的方式，向用户解释系统计算固定资产价值的过程。  

Joule创建固定资产主数据 (Generative AI capability: creating fixed asset master data) 

用户可通过自然语言指令，通过Joule直接创建固定资产主数据（如创建笔记本电脑资产）, 从而减少错误并确保更高的数据准确性和更好的数据治理。 

更多详细内容请参考 @Helen_Han 的博客。 

 

改善销售管理效率 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：销售 

在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508中，销售管理板块从销售订单管理，销售开票，销售退货等进行功能更新： 

  • 灵活对账科目调整和现金结算 
  • 基于项目创建销售订单里程碑开票计划 
  • 第三方销售供应商开票增强检查 
  • 增强销售凭证中自定义字段的容量 
  • 打印销售凭证输出的所有文本 
  • 管理开票凭证应用文本升级 
  • 销售贷/借项凭证请求支持可配置物料 

灵活对账科目调整和现金结算 

 

 

 

基于项目创建销售订单里程碑开票计划 

更多销售模块详细内容请参考 @Feng_Chen 的博客。 

 

强化数据分析能力 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：分析报表 

最新的SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508为分析带来了强大的功能增强，突显了SAP致力于提供优质数据分析工具的承诺。此次更新不仅提升了效率，还增强了嵌入式分析的可用性和功能: 

  • 视图浏览器增强 
  • 多维分析：图表功能升级 
  • 审核手册：页面评论功能 
  • 审核手册APP中的“重置”功能 
  • 升级审核手册报表 
  • 【重要】弃用的分析业务目录 
  • 【重要】CE2508 弃用的CDS 视图 

 

 

更多详细内容请参考 @AngelaDai  的博客。

优化制造流程 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：制造 

 在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition  2508制造板块增强了变更管理和物料清单管理的产品功能，同时也对生产计划替换了部分应用。 

变更管理与物料清单管理的集成增强 

监控物料覆盖范围（F2101A）替换了原来的监控物料覆盖范围（F2101） 

增强以下产品能力： 

  • 支持选择多项物料（不超过200） 
  • 显示最近一次MRP Run的日期和时间 
  • 导航到制造关键app: 如维护时间相关库存级别 
  • 显示订单报告(审核订单进度）等 

更多制造模块详细内容请参考 @RiyaYang 的博客。

优化供应链流程 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：供应链管理和质量管理 

在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508中，供应链管理板块从库存管理、订单承诺、库存盘点、仓库管理几大内容，质量管理板块从质量检验等进行功能更新，具体可查看blog。 

  • 库存管理 – 库存-多种物料（MB52替代应用） 

 

库存查询是决策的重要基础。MB52常用于查询工厂和库存地点的物料库存，现在可以用替代应用“库存-多种物料”（App ID: F1595）实现此功能。此应用允许显示多种物料的库存数量、金额以及特殊库存等信息。  

  • 仓库管理 - 比较仓库管理与库存管理之间的库存 

 

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508推出的Compare Stock with Inventory Management应用程序简化了库存对比。此应用可帮助企业检查并纠正仓库管理（WM层）与库存管理（IM层）之间的差异。该应用不仅能识别库存数据差异，还可以根据实际库存更新IM层库存数据，确保库存记录一致性，降低运营风险，提升库存管理的效率，优化供应链流程。 

更多供应链管理模块详细内容请参考 @ecco_liu 的博客。

简化采购流程与优化寻源 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 亮点前瞻：寻源和采购 

最新的SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508中，寻源和采购版块中的下列子模块均发布了一些相关的新功能以及重大变化: 

  • 寻源和合同管理 
  • 运营采购 
  • 集中采购 
  • 发票管理 

寻源和合同管理  

APP批量更改采购信息记录：新版本中的这款应用，您现在可以使用 “价格条件有效日期”作为筛选条件，根据采购信息记录的条件记录有效性来显示其报表。“价格条件有效日期” 筛选器仅可以输入单个日期值。当指定日期处于条件有效期内（包括 “有效起始日” 和 “有效截止日”）时，相关采购信息记录将被显示出来。 

更多采购寻源模块详细内容请参考 @Qi_Liu 的博客。

提高财务透明度 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：财务 

 基于事件的结算投资项目和在建工程 

  • 基于事件结算的投资项目，其所有过账行项目都会直接完全过账到关联的投资计量在建工程，从而保持成本流转的全程可追溯，优化企业项目管理，简化用户执行投资项目到在建工程结算的工作量。 

实际成本率计算 - 成本中心支持独立的货币迭代以消除成本中心差异 

在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508前，实际成本率计算 - 成本中心(KSII)仅支持以全球货币进行实际成本率计算，公司代码货币及自由定义货币下的实际成本率从全球货币根据汇率换算而来，导致部分金额无法被完全贷记，残留成本滞留在成本中心，会影响后续成本分摊及账面精度，增加对账难度。 

详细请参考 @BobShen 的 博客。 

加强系统扩展性 - SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508亮点前瞻：可拓展性 

在SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508的更新中，可拓展性也迎来了许多更新。本次更新主要包含可拓展性对象、ABAP 开发工具、可拓展性助手的相关更新。 可拓展性对象的调整更好地满足用户的业务需求，同时也有一些 API 已经过时，需要替换成后继版本的 API 。ABAP 开发工具的增强有助于更好的使用开发者可拓展性。可拓展性助手（需要额外 License ）让关键用户可拓展性的使用更加便捷 

详情请参考 @Zhehui_Xia28 的博客。

entry.title: Exploring AI and next-gen Cloud ERP innovations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508
entry.content:
The 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition is out and this product blog by @BeSchulze give a great overview of the key innovation. With this update, SAP continues to push the boundaries of enterprise automation and intelligence. With the latest innovations powered by generative AI, customers benefit from improved transparency, faster decision-making, and simpler day-to-day operations. From financial consolidation to payment analysis and sustainability reporting, these updates bring intelligent capabilities directly into the flow of business. 

This video is very special as you will meet my new Synthesia avatar, who will give you a summary of the key "AI"-led innovations for this release. By the way, what do you think about this avatar? Let me know in the comments. 

 

Group Reporting: AI-assisted business insights for group financial statements review booklet

Building on the successful beta release in 2502, predefined AI-assisted business insights—also known as quick actions—are now generally available in the Group Financial Statements Review Booklet. These insights help streamline financial review processes by highlighting key figures, variances, and relevant context in natural language.

The Group Financial Statements Review Booklet, Cost Centers Review Booklet, and Project Financial Booklet – Professional Services now all include AI-powered business insights that enable faster analysis and easier interpretation of financial data. By reducing manual analysis effort and surfacing relevant context automatically, these booklets drive efficiency across various reporting tasks.

Figure 1: AI-assisted financial business insights

 

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, AI-assisted payment exception analysis

In the Manage Automatic Payments app (App ID: F0770), a new AI capability enhances the process of analyzing payment exceptions after a payment proposal run. This feature not only provides natural language explanations of payment exceptions but also highlights relevant log entries and suggests resolution actions.

This innovation reduces the time spent investigating and resolving issues in payment proposals. By guiding users directly to the root cause and recommended next steps, the process becomes significantly more efficient—improving payment accuracy and minimizing delays in financial operations.

Figure 2: AI-assisted payment exception analysis

 

Figure 3: Digital Library - AI-Assisted Features

 

Enabling automatic allocations of carbon quantities by reflecting allocations in financial accounting

With growing importance on sustainable business practices, the 2508 release introduces automatic allocation of carbon quantities aligned with financial accounting data. This feature retrieves financial flow data from the connected system and automatically calculates account assignments, target accounts, and allocation ratios.

No manual calculation of receiver percentages is needed—carbon data is allocated consistently based on monetary values. This ensures alignment between sustainability and financial reporting, offering more precise reflection of operational impact and enabling integrated performance tracking across both domains.

Figure 4: Manage Allocations – Create from Financial Flow

 

Figure 5: Automatic allocation of carbon quantities

 

Unlock seamless data access with AI-assisted easy enterprise search 

Accessing business data is now even more intuitive with the AI-assisted easy enterprise search, which allows users to search using natural language. Instead of navigating through complex structures, a simple query like “Show me sales orders overall status in process” or “Show me open sales orders that have a net value greater than 100 EUR” provides relevant results instantly.

The system adapts the search results based on the user’s role, ensuring that only the most relevant business objects are presented. This not only improves search accuracy but also accelerates insight extraction—making it easier to act quickly and confidently in a data-rich environment. To enable this feature, select the 'enable AI natural language search' checkbox in the user profile settings.

 

Currently in beta testing: AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for applications 

Personalizing the My Home workspace becomes faster and smarter with the new AI-assisted smart personalization feature. Currently in beta testing, it allows users to tailor their applications and insight tiles using natural language.

Applications can be added in just two clicks, including a preview to confirm suitability. This streamlines customization, especially for new or infrequent users, by offering AI-powered suggestions, application descriptions, and live KPIs for dynamic tiles. The experience is intuitive and efficient, ensuring that personalization aligns with users’ daily workflows.

Interested in experiencing these improvements first-hand? Join the SAP beta testing for the latest AI-assisted features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 and contribute to shaping future developments. For more information, see: Get Involved Early, and register today to help drive the evolution of AI advancements. 

 

Currently in beta testing: AI-assisted easy fill 

Also in beta, AI-assisted easy fill reimagines how form fields are completed. Instead of manually searching for and filling out fields, users can enter data via natural language. The system intelligently matches input to the correct fields and provides a clear overview before confirmation.

This innovation saves time, reduces navigation complexity, and increases accuracy in form completion. With automatic field matching and editable previews, easy fill offers a new level of convenience for maintaining business objects efficiently.

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 delivers a powerful set of innovations that bridge insight and action with the support of generative AI. Whether it's optimizing financial processes, enhancing personalization, or improving sustainability reporting, these features demonstrate SAP’s commitment to building a truly intelligent cloud ERP system.

Interested in experiencing this enhanced feature? Join the SAP beta testing for the latest AI-assisted features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 and contribute to shaping future developments. For more information, see: Get Involved Early, and register today to help drive the evolution of AI advancements. 

We’re also pleased to share that three recently introduced AI-assisted user experience innovations—enterprise search,easy filter,and smart summarization—are now available in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition at no additional cost. To get started, simply accept the SAP AI Terms. Once completed, we’ll reach out to enable these capabilities on your tenants, so you can immediately begin benefiting from more intuitive interactions, faster insights, and enhanced productivity.

 

Joule for Business

With this release, Joule for Business brings a new dimension of intelligent assistance to SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, enabling business users to interact with their systems through natural language while achieving impactful outcomes faster.

Figure 6: SAP Joule for Business

By embedding artificial intelligence directly into the system, Joule acts as a digital assistant that transforms how users navigate and operate business applications. It removes technical barriers by interpreting user intent and delivering contextually relevant results, all through intuitive, conversational interaction.

 

Simplifying service contract management

Joule for Business makes managing service contracts more seamless than ever. Users can describe their needs in natural language—for example, “show me my upcoming expiring service contracts”—and Joule provides direct access to the relevant apps such as Manage Service Contracts, Service Management Overview, and the Service Contracts Dashboard.

Figure 7: Navigational assistance to service contract management applications through Joule

From reviewing performance to processing contracts at scale, apps like Mass Processing of Service Contracts and Monitor Auto Renewal Logs become instantly accessible. This intuitive guidance enhances user satisfaction, shortens time to action, and significantly increases efficiency in service contract workflows.

 

Streamlining solution order management

For managing solution orders, Joule transforms user interaction into a results-driven experience. Whether the need is to assess order profitability or track fulfillment progress, users simply express what they want in natural language. Joule interprets the request and navigates directly to apps like Solution Orders Overview or Solution Order Profitability.

Figure 8: Navigational assistance to solution order management applications through Joule

This saves time, reduces manual steps, and lets users focus on driving outcomes rather than figuring out system navigation. Joule ensures that the most relevant tools are just a prompt away, transforming how users approach solution order management.

 

AI-Assisted sales order status check

In sales operations, timely status checks are critical. Joule for Business introduces an AI-powered capability to check the status of sales orders and flag any fulfillment issues. Instead of scanning through data manually, users can now ask questions like “What’s blocking the delivery of my sales order?”

entry.title: Try the latest AI features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508
entry.content:
The 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition contains enhancements to popular AI features and new natural language interaction options that help you work more intelligently and intuitively.

We’ve spent the past 6 months since the 2502 release working with your feedback – from beta programs, to roundtable discussions in the Public Cloud Practitioner Forum, to one-on-one meetings with customers – to learn how we can help you achieve more with the help of AI in your system. Let’s take a look at what’s new, update you on the commercialization of some features, and give you resources for getting involved with our upcoming beta program. 

Natural language filtering now supports a wider range of queries

The AI-assisted easy filter (first released in 2502) enables you to filter list reports in your SAP Fiori elements-based apps using natural language. This simplifies how you access the information you need and reduces the training time required to pick up new applications delivered by SAP.

AI-assisted easy filter enables natural language filtering of pages with lists of business objects. Here the user can filter for a given sold-to party using plain language rather than needing to know its key..

For 2508, we’ve made a number of enhancements to make interactions with AI-assisted easy filter even more intuitive:

  1. Tables can be filtered without needing to know an object’s specific key. Instead, simply enter the name of the object you are looking for. The AI-assisted easy filter will map that text to the intended key and apply it to the filter fields for you, which is a much more natural way to search for information. In the event that there are multiple keys with similar names, you will receive results filtered for those names. As before, you can always refine your results in the input field or using the classic filtering.
  2. We’ve also worked to ensure parity between the filter fields that can be applied using the AI-assisted easy filter and the classic filter bar. Some users had reported that, in some cases, AI-assisted easy filter would not apply queries to certain filters. This was caused by the fact that some of the filter fields used navigation paths to different entities instead of the main entity for the app. This scenario is now supported and you can filter on any property present in the classic filter bar.

My Home Personalization with Insights Cards supports more apps and a new way to query for cards

The ability to create Insights cards and quickly add them to My Home now supports 20 SAP Fiori apps.

AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for Insights cards was released as a Joule capability as part of its 2503 release. The functionality allows end users to query Joule for business data they regularly need using natural language. The output is displayed as a card that can be added to their My Home page for easy reference. This makes it easier for users to access information they need to make everyday business decisions and move processes forward.

This functionality was initially limited to 9 applications. With the 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, this coverage has been extended to 11 additional applications. This gives users easier and wider access to the business data that is important to them. AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for Insights cards now supports the following applications:

  1. Find Maintenance Order
  2. Find Maintenance Order and Operation
  3. Maintain Bill Of Material
  4. Manage Business Partner Master Data
  5. Manage Customer Returns
  6. Manage Manual Reservations
  7. Manage Material Coverage (Version 2)
  8. Manage Outbound Deliveries
  9. Manage Product Master Data
  10. Manage Purchase Orders (Version 2)
  11. Manage Purchase Requisitions - Professional
  12. Manage Sales Orders
  13. Manage Sales Orders - Version 2
  14. Manage Sales Quotation - Version 2
  15. Manage Supplier Master Data
  16. Manage Usage Decisions
  17. Material Documents Overview
  18. Project Control - Enterprise Projects
  19. Reproceess Failed Material Movements
  20. Supplier Invoices List (Version 2)

Users can now use natural language to create and add Insights Cards directly in My Home.

For the 2508 release, we have also introduced a new way to create Insights cards using natural language: you can access the feature directly from My Home. This gives users the flexibility to choose the personalization option that works best for them, giving them access to the information they need at a glance.

If you'd like to read even more exciting updates about features and functionality included in the 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, check out the following fantastic blogs from my colleagues:

  • For a general overview of new functionality: Highlights of the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 release 
  • For a few more AI uses cases, some focused on particular business processes: Exploring AI and next-gen Cloud ERP innovations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 

Commercialization update: New Base AI includes common AI functions at no additional cost

For the 2508 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, a number of AI solutions have been added to its Base AI offering. This means that you can use the features absolutely free of charge. You simply need to sign the SAP AI terms here and SAP will handle the activation for you.

Included in the Base AI offering for this release are AI-assisted easy filter and AI-assisted smart summarization, as well as AI-assisted enterprise search (which allows you to look up data from the search in My Home). Give them a try!

Try out upcoming AI innovations in the 2508 beta

For customers looking to try out the absolute latest in AI innovations, registration for the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition beta is still open. This is your opportunity to try out and give feedback on new use cases for AI in your system. The solutions up for beta testing are free to use for the duration of the program.  Below is a preview of some of the features that will be available. Please note: Customer/partner participation will be at the discretion of the Beta Testing Program team. Participants must use SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition productively. Future developments are at the discretion of SAP and their details and delivery dates may be changed at any time.

Resolve situations directly in My Home without navigating to applications

AI-assisted smart solution for situations in My Home allows you to quickly take action on business processes that need your attention directly in My Home..

The Situations tab in My Home provides quick summaries of business processes that need to be addressed in your system. Previously, this meant reading the alert on the tile, navigating to the required app(s), and making the required changes. With AI-assisted Smart Solution for Situations in My Home, we’re streamlining how you take action on these scenarios. You’ll now be able to see a summary of the situation, start the relevant business process from quick actions on the card, and even make changes to the business data all without leaving your My Home page. This allows you to stay on top of your business and resolve potential issues even faster.

Streamline data entry in object pages

AI-assisted easy fill streamlines data entry by populating object pages based on natural language input (for example: emails or messages from colleagues).

Depending on your business scenario, SAP Fiori object pages can sometimes be quite complex. Data entry might mean filling a field at the top of the screen, scrolling for several sections to add more information, and so on. AI-assisted easy fill enables you to enter your updates into a single field using natural language. The solution then maps your input to the proper fields, highlights any potential inconsistencies that may need to be addressed, and – after your review – updates the fields. This will help speed up data entry and reduce training time for new users.

Resolve error messages with AI assistance

AI-assisted error explanation provides resolution recommendations to error and warning messages in your system.

Learning new business processes can be tricky. AI-assisted error explanation uses AI to generate explanations and suggest resolutions for errors that are triggered in your system. This streamlines how you handle errors and reduces training time, making you more productive and helping you pick up processes even faster; in addition to reducing your organization’s support load.

Search for applications you need using natural language

AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for applications allows you to search for applications using natural language.

When learning a new business process or stepping into a new role, it can sometimes be challenging to find the exact application you need to carry out a task. With AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for applications, you can search for the app you need using natural language. Simply type in what you need to do and get served the required application, which you can add to your My Home page with a single click. This allows you to access the applications you need without needing to know the exact application name.

We want to hear from you!

Whether you take advantage of the new free features in the Base AI package, subscribe to cutting edge technologies, or choose to take part in a beta program; we want to hear what you think about these solutions! Give them a try and share your feedback below or with the product team. Your experience is critical to understanding how we can make these innovations even better for you.

When you’re ready to get involved, you can:

  1. Register to use base AI features
  2. Sign up for the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition beta
  3. Join the Public Cloud Practitioner Forum (for customers live on SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition)

Happy experimenting! We’ll be back with another update for the 2602 release of SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

entry.title: What’s New in SAP Central Business Configuration 2506
entry.content:
Global Expansion with the Configuration Localization Tool

Navigating the complexities of implementing enterprise software systems across various countries and regions can be a daunting task. A crucial aspect of this process is localization, which involves tailoring the software to meet local legal, regulatory, and cultural requirements. SAP facilitates this process by offering around 60 standard local versions. However, businesses operating in countries beyond SAP's standard offering may have faced significant challenges in the past.

Historically, manual efforts in on-premise projects were the norm, and public cloud solutions lacked viable options for these scenarios. But things have changed now with the introduction of the Configuration Localization Tool, which is embedded in SAP Central Business Configuration. This tool has transformed the localization process, making it more straightforward and efficient.


Adding non-standard countries/regions in the Define Scope app

SAP has introduced a self-service approach for implementing new countries and regions that go beyond the standard offering. This method, known as localization as a self-service for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, enables you to activate these countries with preconfigured content based on on the settings of a source country or region, currently Germany, giving you a head start in implementing localized operations in a wider range of countries worldwide. The localized scope for each newly created country version is almost equivalent to the German reference scope. This places these custom localizations among the top five in terms of scope flexibility, surpassing many of the smaller standard-localized countries. While the technical localization is taken care of, partners and customers customize the country from a business perspective.

The Configuration Localization Tool not only expands your country coverage but also saves you from the manual efforts associated with on-premise projects in the past, accelerating your organization’s global expansion.

For a quick summary, check out this video about What's New in 2506. Don’t forget to also use the What’s New Viewer on the SAP Help Portal, which provides further details and links about all the recent changes.

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 Release My Home

My Home 2508 Salutation bar

entry.title: Empowering Business Users with Personalized News in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 Release
entry.content:
Keeping business users informed about system and company news is essential for organizational success. When users are aware of changes that could impact their daily tasks, they can make better decisions, adapt more quickly, and boost overall productivity. Staying up to date—especially with updates on processes, departments, or system changes—helps eliminate confusion and ensures alignment across teams.  

While our existing news feed provides valuable updates on SAP system changes, we’ve listened closely to customer feedback and enhanced communication and user experience on My Home even further. In the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 release, we now offer the ability to customize and manage the My Home news feed through the new Manage News application.

Manage News Application

 

Introducing the Manage News Application 

The Manage News application empowers news administrators to deliver timely, targeted information updates directly to business users via a centralized news feed. 

Key capabilities for news administrators include: 

  • Create, manage, and publish news articles: Administrators can compose news posts to be displayed on My Home, controlling the flow of critical company and system updates. 
  • Control visibility and importance: News items can be marked as critical, ensuring essential information is highlighted and receives appropriate attention from business users. 
  • Plan and schedule communications: Administrators can organize when specific news should be published, enabling timely and organized delivery of updates. 
  • Language adaptation: Messages can be tailored in all company-supported languages, ensuring effective communication across diverse user groups. 
  • Targeted audience assignment: News can be assigned to specific App Transaction codes, so only users with access to the corresponding Fiori apps or transaction codes will see relevant news items. 
  • Organize news by groups or categories: News articles can be grouped into categories such as Finance or Human Resources, making it easy for users to find pertinent information. 
  • Visual enhancements: Administrators can upload images aligned with news topics to make posts more engaging and visually informative. 

News article creation in Manage News Application

 

What Business Users Will Experience 

The My Home news feed now displays articles created by news administrators, neatly organized into designated categories. Critical updates are clearly marked with an eye-catching critical marker to ensure users notice and prioritize these messages. 

This personalized news feature centralizes essential communications in one place, tailored to the needs of each user based on their system app access. By delivering relevant, timely information directly to business users, organizations can foster a more informed and agile workforce. 

 Critical News displayed in My Home News Feed 

Critical News Article in My Home News dialog

 

Benefits for Your Organization 

With the Manage News application, administrators can tailor the news feed to reflect the specific needs of your company or organization, enabling more effective communication with business users. This streamlined and targeted approach to information sharing helps: 

  • Improve user awareness and decision-making 
  • Minimize confusion and misalignment across teams 
  • Increase adaptability to system or process changes 
  • Enhance overall company performance 

 

Prerequisites 

To access the Manage News application users or administrators will have to be assigned to the SAP_CORE_BC_CUX_NWS_MNG_PC business catalogue. For business users to view the news feed on My Home they will have to be assigned SAP_CORE_BC_CUX_NWS_DSP_PC catalogue. The SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition SAP_BR_EMPLOYEE role will already have SAP_CORE_BC_CUX_NWS_DSP_PC business catalogue assigned. With the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 release, news maintained in the Manage News application will be displayed by default for all customers who have not configured a RSS feed or SAP Custom System News. To display the news from the Manage News application the 'Manage News App' setting needs to be enabled via UI Adaptation mode (Adapt UI in the User Actions menu). Users or administrator must have the catalog SAP_CORE_BC_EXT_FLEX attached to their role to access the UI Adaptation key user capabilities. 

My Home UI Adaptation Mode News Feed Settings

 

We’re excited to bring this powerful new communication feature to you with the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 release and look forward to seeing how it helps your business stay connected and informed.

entry.title: SAP UX Q3/2025 Update – Part 3: Beta AI Innovations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508
entry.content:
This third post in my series gives an overview of the very latest user experience innovations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508, which are so new that they are only released for customers to try them out via beta testing. They are all AI-related, for My Home, for working with SAP Fiori elements based applications, as well as for some individual application use cases.

In case you missed them, Part 2 covers the generally available UX innovations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508, and Part 1 explains how users in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition can query SAP Analytics Cloud directly via Joule, as well as providing general information about Joule and central entry points and services.

This post covers these innovations for:

My Home

  • AI-assisted smart solution for situations in My Home.
  • AI-assisted smart personalization of My Home for applications.

SAP Fiori elements based applications

  • AI-assisted easy fill.
  • AI-assisted error explanation.

Individual application uses cases

  • AI-assisted payment exception analysis.
  • Accounting accruals agent.

If you want to try out these features as beta testers, then sign-up for beta testing here:

  • Q3/25: Latest AI-assisted user experience features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508

Find out more about beta programs and how to Get Involved Early with SAP innovations in general.

 

My Home UX Innovations

AI-Assisted Smart Solution for Situations in My Home

With this feature, you can now get details of a Business Situation shown directly in place on My Home, and even initiate quick actions or make changes to business data there. This is achieved by expanding the Situation card on My Home when you click on it, as you can see in Figure 1, or in action in this video:

  • Video: AI-Assisted Smart Solution for Situations in My Home in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition (1:00 min.)

Figure 1: Beta: AI-Assisted Smart Solution for Situations in My Home. Alt Text: An image with two screenshots: the upper one shows the top part of My Home showing three Situation cards in the To-Dos section. One titled “This sales quotation is about to expire” is highlighted and linked with an arrow to an expanded card shown in the second screenshot – the card is taller and wider, contains a summary on the left with three action buttons “Change Validity”, “Reject All Items”, “Close Situation”, and more details on the right.

AI-Assisted Smart Personalization of My Home for Applications

So far, as I outlined in Part 2, you can use natural language and AI to personalize your My Home by adding Insights Cards. Now, with this beta functionality, you can use natural language to find and add applications and insights tiles.

If you have the functionality activated in your system, you’ll see the AI button “Add Content” in the salutation bar at the top of My Home, as shown at the top of Figure 2. Clicking on this brings a pop-over with the option to add Insights Cards or, as shown, Apps & Insights Tiles. By describing what you want to do, the system will propose suitable applications and Insights Tiles. If you select them and click “Add”, they will be added, either as an entry in your Apps Favorites section, or in the Insights Tiles section. Figure 2 shows these main steps.

Figure 2: Beta: AI-Assisted Smart Personalization of My Home for Applications. Alt Text: The image shows three screenshots: at the top an extract of My Home showing the blue salutation bar, with an AI button “Add Content” on the right. An arrow has been added linking it to the second screenshot, where a popover “Add Content” is shown, where the user has entered “I want to monitor sales orders what app should I use to do this”, and two of four results are listed and visualized: “Track Sales Orders” and “Manage Sales Orders” (shown as an insight tile). Below that a screenshot of the outcome in My Home: the former is added to Apps Favorites, the latter to Insights Tiles.

 Watch a demo:

  • Video: AI-Assisted Smart Personalization of My Home for Applications in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition (1:11 min.)

 For a summary of all the news for My Home, both generally available and for beta-testing, read this blog post:

  • My Home in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 - What's new?

 

AI UX Innovations for Applications based on SAP Fiori elements

AI-Assisted Easy Fill

Users often receive requests via e-mails or chats to change data in the system. This new feature makes it much easier to update the fields in the various sections of an object page based on SAP Fiori elements, such as a sales order. Instead of manually scanning the e-mail and navigating to the relevant sections and fields in the object page, you can just paste the text into Easy Fill and it will automatically identify the correct fields to update, with proposals for the correct entries.

The power of AI means that the new values do not have to be exactly contained in the text. Figure 3 shows an example, where the new address is given without actually mentioning the name of the city, only the street and post code, along with an abbreviation for the state and country (“BW DE”). As you can see, the proposed new values are correct, despite this missing or abbreviated information.

Figure 3: Beta: AI-Assisted Easy Fill for SAP Fiori elements based applications. Alt-Text: A screenshot showing an Easy Fill pop-over, with a text entry field on the left with text from a customer e-mail informing about a change of name and address for their store, and on the left showing the “Filled Fields”, a list of seven fields for which new values are proposed.

Watch a demo:

  • Video: AI-Assisted Easy Fill of SAP Fiori Elements-Based Applications in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition (1:15 min.)

Note that this feature is only available for applications based on SAP Fiori elements.

AI-Assisted Error Explanation

We started beta testing for this with the 2502 release, and have decided to continue with beta testing in this 2508 release. The explanation I gave in my February blog post continues to apply:

New users who are unfamiliar with the system may find that the short error messages give too little information for them to fully understand the issue, and what to do about it. The AI-Assisted Error Explanation (beta) in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition summarizes information which explains the error and provide a recommendation for how to resolve it. Figure 8 shows an example where a user has entered a Sold-to-Party ID which does not exist in the system.

Note that this feature is also only available for applications based on SAP Fiori elements.

Figure 4: Beta: AI-Assisted Error Explanation in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2502. ALT Text: On the left part of a data entry screen is shown, with the field “Sold-to Party containing “ABC” marked red and below that a  popover with an error message “No customer master record exists for sold-to-party ABC”, and in the text line below that the AI icon followed by “Generate Explanation”. A fat arrow leads from this text to the image on the right, which indicates what happens when you click on this text: you get a popover with an short Explanation section and a longer Resolution section with numbered actions.

If you want a summary of the latest such generic AI-assisted features, both generally available and for beta-testing, with some different examples, have a look at this blog post:

  • Try the latest AI features in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508.

 

AI Innovations in Individual Application Use Cases

AI-Assisted Payment Exception Analysis

Most payments of invoices from vendors are automated, but sometimes data is missing or incorrect so that an automatic payment fails. These issues are collected in error logs, and one of the more tedious tasks of Accounts Payable Accountant is to scan through these error logs, understand what went wrong and why, and then fix it.

With AI-assisted payment exception analysis, we make this task much easier and less tedious: users can choose an entry in the error log and simply click on the AI button “Analyze Exception”. The system then provide an analysis, a recommended resolution in natural language, as well as a links to a selection of the most relevant log entries. If a user wants all the relevant logs, they are just one click away. Figure 5 shows what this looks like:

Figure 5: Beta: AI-assisted payment exception analysis. Alt Text: A screenshot of the Revise Payment Proposals applicatin, showing a list of payment exceptions grouped by Error ID. Four error IDs are listed, covering 419 exceptions. One is expanded and has one exception listed in the row below. The main part of the image is a pop-over “Exception Analysis and Resolution”, with natural language explanations in sections “Analysis” and “Resolution” and a section “Logs” with a list of selected logs, and a button to select “All Logs”.

Alternatively, watch this:

  • Video: AI-assisted payment exception analysis (1:20 min.)

Accounting Accruals Agent

An accrual is an accounting entry which represents revenue which has been earned or expenses which have incurred but for which no payment has yet been made. That way, when looking at a particular period such as a quarter or a month, accountants get a more accurate picture of a company’s financial position. For example, if a service was delivered, but not paid for within the period, having the accrual means that the cost of delivering the service and the revenue associated with it both appear in the summary for the period.

Calculating accruals and deferrals is often time very time consuming. It can also require estimates based on historical data, if for example invoices have not yet been created, or payment amounts can be reduced if payments are made quickly in the future.

The new accounting accruals agent can significantly speed this up, potentially reducing the time spent on these activities by 80%! This frees up accountants to work on more value-adding activities, such as analysis. As you can see in Figure 6, the agent creates a list of accrual proposals. For each proposal, you can details on the recommendation, including an explanation for the basis of the recommendation.

Figure 6: Beta: Accrual Proposals made by the accounting accruals agent. Alt Text: A screenshot of the Accrual Proposals applications, showing a list of six accrual proposals on the left. The details of the one selected are shown on the right, showing the recommended accrual amount, the proposed line items and a section “Basis of AI Recommendation” with a natural language explanation along with a bar chart and a forecast line for the trend per month.

Watch this video to find out more:

  • Video: Accounting Accruals Agent (1:36 min.)

 

Continued soon …

I hope you enjoyed this third part, covering the new UX innovations available for beta testing with SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508. I will post part four in the next few days, covering exciting new UX innovations available SAP Success Factors.

Do keep posting your experiences and recommendations yourself in the SAP Community, with the SAP Fiori and/or the User Experience tag! In case you are wondering how to get a list of the most recent blog posts on SAP Fiori and User Experience in our new SAP Community, use these links:

entry.title: Enterprise Portfolio and Project Management in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508
entry.content:
Welcome to your one-stop shop to learn and share knowledge about SAP's ready-to-run public Cloud ERP software solution.  

SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition is part of SAP Business Suite that brings AI, data, and applications together into a fully integrated system. This community is open for anyone in the Cloud ERP ecosystem–customers, partners, and SAP experts.  

 

In this blog post I’d like to outline the innovations for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 in the area of Enterprise Portfolio and Project Management. These are the topics that are covered:

  • Efficient project plan scheduling: Calculate dates for project structure elements in a project plan (6JN)
  • Embedding content in SAP Project and Resource Management (6JN)
  • Monitoring and comprehensive insights with project financial booklets (1NT) 
  • Creation of WBS elements across company codes for revenue projects (1NT) 
  • Create billing plan dates from project milestones​ (1NT) 
  • Further innovations

 

Check out my video to get a glimpse of the new features:

 

 

In the dynamic world of business, the ability to efficiently manage portfolios and projects is a crucial determinant of success. It's here that SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, steps in as a transformative solution, offering a comprehensive suite of innovations designed to help businesses streamline operations, enhance financial insight, and foster collaboration. This blog post delves into these groundbreaking innovations, emphasizing their business value and how they empower end-users to achieve unparalleled efficiency and effectiveness.

Enhancements in SAP Project and Resource Management

Efficient project plan scheduling: Calculate dates for project structure elements in a project plan

At the core of successful project management is the ability to schedule and manage timelines effectively. The latest release introduces new scheduling capabilities such as backward and bottom-up scheduling within SAP Project and Resource Management. For project managers, this enhanced scheduling functionalities ensure precise timeline predictions, they reduce project delays and pave the way for timely completions. By automating scheduling, project managers can focus on strategic tasks, improving overall project efficiency. As a nice side effect, more reliable schedules, conflicts and resource contention are minimized.

You can also find more information in the blog post provided by my colleague Ellen Reuther.

 

Figure 1: Enhanced scheduling functionalities such as backward and bottom-up scheduling optimizes project planning. 

 

Embedding content in SAP Project and Resource Management

Moreover, embedded content in SAP Project and Resource Management offers significant efficiency boost for project management through customization.

You can integrate custom dashboards directly into SAP to display essential KPIs seamlessly, enhancing focus and reducing the need to switch applications. You can also modify project management interfaces as business needs evolve, ensuring continuous alignment with objectives. Embedded content remains fully functional post-system upgrades, minimizing technical disruptions and preserving focus on core tasks.

You can also find more information in the help.

 

Figure 2: Flexible extension capabilities allow for seamless integration of custom content directly within SAP applications.

 

Enhancements in Enterprise Portfolio and Project Management

Monitoring and comprehensive insights with project financial booklets

The new application “Project Financial Booklet – Enterprise Projects” is designed for project controllers and accountants, offering insights into project profitability through multidimensional analysis. This application provides three pivotal views, each delivering a granular perspective on financial health:

  • Project margin overview
  • Project billing element view
  • Project budget availability control (AVC),

 

This enables you to conduct deep profitability analyses, allowing you to quickly identify and act on top-performing projects. The flexibility of its filtering and customization options ensures that you can tailor reports to align with specific business objectives, thereby enhancing decision-making accuracy.

Figure 3: Leveraging conditional formatting as part of the project budget AVC view brings any alerts immediately to your attention.

 

Moreover, the innovation's real-time conditional formatting acts as a proactive alert system, helping you to stay ahead of potential financial risks by highlighting critical figures like budget utilization. Its seamless integration with other applications promotes efficient navigation and a holistic perspective on the project environment. By fostering early trend detection and anomaly recognition, this tool enables project managers to make informed, strategic decisions, thereby reducing financial risks and improving resource allocation. Overall, the booklet empowers businesses to drive efficiency, optimize budget management, and ultimately enhance profitability, making it a pivotal advancement in project financial oversight. Currently, this functionality is available for sales accountants only, but it’s planned to be available for project financial controllers with the future release.

 

Figure 4: Explore the different views as part of the new project financial booklet ensuring efficient project analysis.

 

Creation of WBS elements across company codes for revenue projects

With SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508, we allow users to create Work Breakdown Structure (WBS) elements that span multiple company codes specifically for revenue projects. This capability was previously available for overhead, statistical, and investment projects, but is now extended to revenue projects.

A significant feature is that within a single billing hierarchy of a project, only one company code is maintained, ensuring that profitability can be viewed in the local currency of the company code. If an overarching view of the project’s profitability is desired, it can be evaluated in a global currency or project currency. In practical terms, this allows for the execution of a single revenue project using multiple legal entities, enhancing the flexibility and complexity with which projects can be managed and structured across different geographical areas or business units.

The system includes validations to ensure compliance, such as ensuring that a single billing hierarchy isn't assigned multiple company codes. This feature supports API capability, meaning that project creation and management can also be done through external systems, maintaining the integrity of this multi-company code structure. These enhancements help streamline project execution and profitability analysis across diverse company codes in global organizations. 

 

Figure 5: The creation of WBS elements across company codes is enabled for revenue projects.

 

Create billing plan dates from project milestones

This innovation aims to improve synchronization between project management and billing processes. It allows users to integrate project milestones directly with sales order billing plans, creating a seamless connection between project progress and billing schedules. By doing so, it ensures that billing can be triggered automatically upon milestone completion, enhancing efficiency and accuracy in financial transactions.

Project managers and finance teams can get real-time visibility into billing and revenue forecasts based on project status. Furthermore, manual interventions and potential errors related to billing alignments are reduced. The feature is designed to support revenue recognition processes by aligning project deliverables with contractual billing terms, thereby optimizing cash flow management. Overall, this innovation is part of a broader effort to streamline enterprise project management within the SAP ecosystem, ensuring tight integration across corporate functions.

 

Figure 6: Execute revenue projects via multiple legal entities: Create billing plan items based on project milestones.  

 

Further innovations

Extending project control – Enterprise projects application

With the “Project Control – Enterprise Projects” application you can now enable SAP UI5 adaptation. This enhancement allows for the creation of application variants via the SAPUI adaptation project, granting flexibility without altering the original source.

Changes made are reflected in artifacts representing only the updates, not the entire application, and are handled within the SAP Business Application Studio. This ensures that the modifications are seamless, maintaining the integrity and performance of the original application. For further information, please refer to Extending SAP Fiori Applications | SAP Help Portal


Use extended situation handling for enterprise projects

We have enhanced the situation handling framework by allowing self-modeled situation templates within the SAP S/4HANA Cloud environment. This feature aims to address operational inefficiencies and errors that result from manual oversight in enterprise project execution phases. By enabling key users to create custom situation use cases that align with specific business scenarios, the system helps to proactively mitigate risks such as delays and demand fluctuations. Read more in this blog post by my colleague Mark Huang.


Deprecation of resource-related intercompany billing

With SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition 2508 we have deprecated the traditional resource-related intercompany billing and are introducing a successor model that offers greater flexibility and transparency.

This new approach is easily activated through configuration settings and allows continued use of existing applications and records during transition. The new model aims to streamline processes and improve financial visibility, although existing records can still be managed and used with the upgraded system. Find out how to activate the new resource-related intercompany billing here.

 

SAP Project and Resource Management enhancements

Resource managers now have the ability to set request data as fulfilled, which aids in bookkeeping by marking resource requests as completed. More insights into resource management, especially focusing on the staffing of the right employees can be found in the Miguel von Rotz’s blog post.

Moreover, we’ve enhanced project management capabilities via increased API coverage for issue management and project planning, along with predefined custom fields for issue objects. Last but not least, we have made some integration improvements to further streamline processing statuses for projects, ultimately enhancing the overall management capabilities.

If you want to find out more about streamlined collaboration in ETO projects, you can also refer to the blog post published by my colleague Renato Zadro.

 

More Information

This blog focuses on how to get documents out from the SAP Print Queue and how to pass them on to an external Output Management System (OMS) for processing and printing using the SAP provided API. It supplements the already existing blog with example implementation with JAVA code of  SAP_COM_0466 - Print Queue Item - Read (A2X).

Example code for SAP_COM_0466 - Print Queue Item - Read (A2X)

See the details on SAP_COM_0466 | SAP Help Portal how to configure your SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition system to support Print Queues. 
Prerequisites: 

  • Compiled with SAPMachine 21. You can download here.
  • Download (e.g. here) and add latest version of class org.json 
  • Adapt with your personal connection and access details.  

Please note that code is meant as example how the api can be used. Code is not claimed to be complete, to be error free or to be state of the art programming style. 

Usage of the example code

  1. Download (e.g. here) and add latest version of class org.json 
  2. Adopt cope with your access details
  3. Compile code (I used SAPMachine 21).

  5. Create a document on the configured print queue in SAP System

        StringBuilder BearerToken         = new StringBuilder("");                                             // Buffer for bearer token
        System_Str    System_Details[]    = new System_Str[1];                                                 // System details strcture
        String        ListOfQueues[]      = new String[100];                                                   // List of print queues
        int           NumberOfQueues[]    = new int[1];                                                        // Number of print queues
        int           NoOfQItems_Queue[]  = new int[1];                                                        // Number of print queue items in print queue
        int           NoOfQItems_Queues[] = new int[100];                                                      // Number of print queue items per print queue
        QItem_Str     QItemList[]         = new QItem_Str[100];                                                // List of print queue item IDs per queue
        long          timer_cur;                                                                               // Current time stamp
        long          timer_new;                                                                               // time stamp for next planned ICM cache polling
        int           lauf1;                                                                                   // loop variable 1
        int           lauf2;                                                                                   // loop variable 2
        boolean       new_request;                                                                             // flag for new print queue items
        
        
        ResponseCode = Get_System_Details( System_Details );                                                   // get system details
        System.out.println(ResponseCode + " Get_System_Details");        
        
        Credentials = "Basic " + new String(Base64.getEncoder().encode((System_Details[0].SystemUser + ":" + System_Details[0].SystemPassword).getBytes())); // build credentials
        
        ApiCall      = "Get_PrintQueuesOfUserExt";                                                             // prepare api call
        ResponseCode = Get_PrintQueuesOfUserExt(NumberOfQueues, ListOfQueues, Credentials, System_Details[0]); // call api Get_PrintQueuesOfUserExt
        if ( (ResponseCode == 401) & ( System_Details[0].SystemType.equals("SAP BTP")) ) {                     // in case of expired bearer token request new bearer token
            ApiCall      = "Get_Bearer_Token";                                                                 // prepare Get_Bearer_Token
            ResponseCode = Get_Bearer_Token( BearerToken, Credentials, System_Details[0]);                     // call Get_Bearer_Token
            System.out.println(ResponseCode + " " + ApiCall);                                                  // output api call result
            Credentials  = "Bearer " + BearerToken.toString();                                                 // copy bearer token to credentials
            //System.out.println("BearerToken: \"" + Credentials + "\"");        
            if (ResponseCode == 200) {                                                                         // retry api call in case of good bearer token
                ApiCall = "Get_PrintQueuesOfUserExt";                                                          // prepare api call
                ResponseCode = Get_PrintQueuesOfUserExt(NumberOfQueues, ListOfQueues, Credentials, System_Details[0]); // call api Get_PrintQueuesOfUserExt
            }
        }        
        System.out.println(ResponseCode + " " + ApiCall);                                                      // output api call result
        if (ResponseCode != 200)                                                                               // in case of invalid bearer token quit program
            System.exit(0);
        

        for (lauf1 = 0; lauf1 < NumberOfQueues[0]; lauf1++) {                                                  // output of all print queues
            System.out.println("    Queue:" + ListOfQueues[lauf1]); 
        }
        
        if ( System_Details[0].SystemType.equals("SAP BTP") ) 
            Get_IcmCache_old = "SCP 1704067200000";                                                            // on BTP: seconds since 1.1.1970 on 1.1.2024
        else 
            Get_IcmCache_old = "19000101000000.0000000";                                                       // on SAP S/4 HANA (any type) initial date+time

        new_request = false;                                                                                   // set flag for new print queue items to false
        Get_IcmCache_new = Get_IcmCache_old;                                                                   // set flag for new print queue items to false
        timer_cur = java.time.Instant.now().getEpochSecond();                                                  // get current time stamp
        timer_new = timer_cur;                                                                                 // make sure that next ICM cache polling take place immediately 
        
        while (true) {                                                                                         // loop forever
        
            timer_cur = java.time.Instant.now().getEpochSecond();                                              // read current time-stamp
            if (timer_cur >= timer_new) {                                                                      // check if next ICM cache polling reached
                timer_new = timer_cur + System_Details[0].Interval;                                            // set time for next ICM cache polling 
                ApiCall      = "ICMCache";                                                                     // prepare api call
                ResponseCode = Get_IcmCache(ICMCache, Credentials, System_Details[0]);                         // call api Get_IcmCache
                Get_IcmCache_new = ICMCache.toString();                                                        // convert ICM cahce status to string
                System.out.println( ResponseCode + " " + ApiCall + ": \"" + Get_IcmCache_new + "\"" );         // output api call result 
                if ( Get_IcmCache_new.equals(Get_IcmCache_old) == false ) {                                    // compare old and new ICM cache status 
                    Get_IcmCache_old = Get_IcmCache_new;                                                       // in case of ICM cache status set flag for new print queue items
                    new_request = true;                                                                         
                }
            }
            else {
                System.out.print("\r" + (timer_new - timer_cur) + "  \r");                                     // output countdown until next ICM cache status polling
                TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(1);                                                                     // wait for 1 second 
            } 
                        
            if (new_request == true) {                                                                                                                     // incase of new print queue items
                new_request = false;                                                                                                                       // delete flag for new print queue items
                System.out.println("    ICM cache changed -> new request(s)");                                                                             // output ICM cache change
                for (lauf1 = 0; lauf1 < NumberOfQueues[0]; lauf1++) {                                                                                      // loop on print queues
                    ApiCall      = "NoOfQItems_Queue  ";                                                                                                   // prepare api call
                    ResponseCode = Get_NumberOfQItemsExt(NoOfQItems_Queue, ListOfQueues[lauf1], Credentials, System_Details[0]);                           // call api Get_NumberOfQItemsExt
                    NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1] = NoOfQItems_Queue[0];                                                                                        // copy number of print queue items in print queue
                    if ( NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1] > 100 ) {
                        NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1] = 100;                                                                                                    // if number of print queue items in print queue larger then 100 reduce to 100
                        new_request = true;                                                                                                                // do next queue item query on next loop
                    }
                    System.out.println(ResponseCode + " " + ApiCall + " for Queue: " + String.format("%-20s",ListOfQueues[lauf1]) + " : " + String.format("%3s",NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1])); // output number of print queue items in print queue
                    if ( NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1] > 0 ) {                                                                                                  // check of there are queue items in print queue
                        ApiCall      = "Get_Next_QItemsExt";                                                                                               // prepare api call
                        ResponseCode = Get_Next_QItemsExt(QItemList, NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1], ListOfQueues[lauf1], Credentials, System_Details[0]);  // call api Get_Next_QItemsExt
                        System.out.println(ResponseCode + " " + ApiCall + " for Queue: " + String.format("%-20s",ListOfQueues[lauf1]) + " : " + String.format("%3s",NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1])); // output api call result 
                        for (lauf2 = 0; lauf2 < NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1]; lauf2++) {                                                                       // output queue items details
                            System.out.println("    QItemId:   " + QItemList[lauf2].QItemId);                                                              // queue item ID
                            System.out.println("    QItemFile: " + QItemList[lauf2].QItemFile);                                                            // queue item file name
                            System.out.println("    QItemSize: " + QItemList[lauf2].QItemSize );                                                           // queue item blob
                            System.out.println("    QItemBlob: " + QItemList[lauf2].QItemBlob );                                                           // queue item file size
                            System.out.println("");            
                        }
                                                
                        if (true) {                                                                                                                        // Either set transfer success "true" or set transfer failed "false"
                            ApiCall      = "PrintItemStatusSet";                                                                                           // prepare api call
                            ResponseCode = PrintItemStatusSet(QItemList, NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1], ListOfQueues[lauf1], Credentials, System_Details[0]);   // call api PrintItemStatusSet
                            System.out.println(ResponseCode + " " + ApiCall + " for Queue: " + ListOfQueues[lauf1]);                                       // output result of api call
                        }
                        else {
                            ApiCall      = "Set_QItems_LastErrorExt";                                                                                      // prepare api call
                            ResponseCode = Set_QItems_LastErrorExt(NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1], ListOfQueues[lauf1], Credentials, System_Details[0]);         // call api Set_QItems_LastErrorExt
                            System.out.println(ResponseCode + " " + ApiCall + ": " + ListOfQueues[lauf1] + "for " + NoOfQItems_Queues[lauf1] + " items");  // output result of api call
                        }
                    } // if ( NoOfQItems_Queues
                } // for (lauf1
            } // if (new_request
        } // while (true
    } // main
} // class SAP_COM_0466_example

Regards
